values:
right.
I started working on saturday and i am already dead -_-
things are being hectic with people to look after and tickets to be sold.I am at the International Olympic Committee offices assisting diplomatics princes and assholes to get their lazy ass in place with common humans.So far so good, but gee, i am falling asleep on the keyboard and i should not.
I am wearing a tie and a suit and this morning did not recognize myself in the mirror.Maybe i was drunk.If so that would be bad considering i haven't been drinking (and for a long time now).
God i feel so weird wearing this stuff.People keeps telling me i look great in it.I personally think it's mockery XD.
Aaaaaaanyhow,. here i am sitting in the office with noone around and the place shrouded in an irreal silence.Maybe i just involuntarily switched off the ear connections with the brain.Who the fuck knows how my brain works,lol



arrgh enough anyway i doubt anyone will have time to waste reading this useless crock of shit.So yeah.

but hey i like to talk to myself once in a while XD

YOU ARE THE POWERFUL ALPHA WEREWOLF!


**Hails to the master of the full moon
nights**
You are the werewolf. In nature,
you are the ultimate sign of strength... but
also of fear. Although pride, loyalty and
the need to be apart of a group are key to
you, you are either welcomed or reveared from
group to group... "People either love ya
or hate ya." This conflict of interests
might force you to alter yourself to become
part of each group, but know that you can't
please everyone. You might feel inclined to
be submissive in order to better fit in or
please others. Have who you are set in stone
before you start applying the peer pressure.
But other than that, you're a kind, good
person.

Common

Well i guess i should have felt it coming but i was too distracted to listen to my body so in short here's what happened:

i was packing my stuff and loading the car. I had everything ready for a couple of days off visiting  to just chill out, snap some pictures, have the so long promised tea and chitchat of world universe and everything.Waterproofs, camera, good music for the trip,some food, a book or 2, some replacements clothes in case the weather went awry and so on.All the lil things you need when you plan to stay out of home for a couple of days.

Actually i wanted to leave on monday but few things came up that stopped me (in perspective it was a "luck" in the bad luck, cuzi would have been a serious pain in the ass): a job interview and the dentist (on monday morning i chewed hard on a lil rock hidin GODKNOWSHOW in my sandwich. I guess it was the salad's fault) to repairs a broken (OW OW OW!) crown.

Anyway while i was loading the car i felt cold sweat coming up and a second after i experienced a stab in my back , at kidney level.My brain took few seconds to register (SHIT SOMEONE STABBED ME!) the event before my knees gave up and i was to the ground writeing in pain. And what pain.
of course noone stabbed me, but didn't help much, y'know?
SO there i am crawling in a water puddle(it's been raining for 3days now) trying to reach the fuckin mobile in the car, having problems breathing without feeling again the stab (which meanwhile turned into a constant pulsating pain).It was a luck that a neighbour was parking the car and ran and help me.Not that i would have died, but would have been hard reaching the damn phone in the front of the car.

20 minutes after i am on the ambulance to the hospital where i was parked in a corridor moaning and bitching about and swearing horrible things not to be repeated here for the kids' and god's sake.
i waited there for like 40 minutes before i grabbed a poor nurse passing by and snapped at her to gime something, to drug me , HECK TO KNOCK ME UNCOUNSCIOUS.ANYTHING TO EASE THE PAIN!
I must have scared her cuz after 5 minutes they took me to a doctor who visited me, pushed and touched here and there eliciting involuntary kicks and groans, just to shrug in the end and say" nothing serious:kidney stones".
so i got and injection that made the pain subside and made me dizzy and a 
phleboclisys dunno what for.
2 needles and i almost passed out (yeah i am a big woe: rip me an arm but do not try to sting me with one of those).

after a couple of hours i went and take a leak (i think the phlebo was for that) and after a new,unespected,light pain you-know-where heard a light tinkle in the toilette.
the bastard got the place it deserved.
it's incredible how something as small as submillimetric rock can bend a human body in 2 without effort.

aaaanyway.

here i am back home with a couple of medicines to take and a load of heavy,grumbling,boiling anger building up.Not that i have anything on which to discharge it, but i was really looking for this long awaited trip.

Well i s'pose there's little i can do besides shaking my fist at...blah dunno what.

I just hope that when the wheel of carma will come to squish me i puncuture its tire with my pointy bones.


well i s'pose it's everything for now.

*goes to drink a liter of water*
------------PS--------------
tomorrow mornig i'll have to go and get an ecography and i am damn sure i'll have to wait like 4 hours for something that only takes 6 minutes to be done.
Guess that's the way the world goes

turned out i am:
Falstaff
You scored 18 evilness, 27 romance, 36 tragic, and 63 comic!
Falstaff is a heavy drinking coward who gives much comic relief in "Henry IV Part I" but is destined to come to a tragic end in "Henry IV Part II." He also appears as a lead comic character in "The Merry Wives of Windsor" and was reputed to be a favorite character of Elizabeth I.



My test tracked 4 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 43% on evilness
 You scored higher than 8% on romance
 You scored higher than 59% on tragic
 You scored higher than 94% on comic
Link: The Shakespeare Character Test written by mandi_g on Ok Cupid
just because i'd use a love potion to make someone i hatefall in love with a rat! blajh -_-;

i was in a foul mood this morning so decided to pull out an image for someone: that usually calms me and steal someone a smile (which is either good).
Since i was watching a documentary on sabertooth felines and was updating my journal here my eye fell on the poor Stormcatcher.
Unfortunately i had no reference to your fursona, Mr, so all i pulled out is a fairly conventional cute cat with big fangs.
Sorry ;)
well there's a good point to this: i already feel better :)
Blue sketch:
http://i8.photobucket.com/albums/a25/Wolfy-J/furries/stormblue.jpg

Final crap:
http://i8.photobucket.com/albums/a25/Wolfy-J/furries/stormend.jpg

blajh! i am done!
*scampers away*

Sadly,'cause i never asked money for my scribbles and feel gulty for doin it.
But i have to, owing to my actual financial status:
the car decided to die on me all of a sudden and i had to spend a wopping 450 Euros to fix the bitch because i need it for my job ( i travel alot and am often in mountain), plus my graphic tablet stopped working so now i am working with an old piece of crap ( a friend felt pity for me and lent me his old Volito wacom tablet which supports pressure sensitivity but crushes my wrist)which causes me to be slower than usual in doing pictures.
Add to this small pile of shit the rent, university taxes and a couple of bills and there you go: my account in red.
I am not relying on money coming from commissions to survive but they would either be very welcome and helpful at the present time. So if you are interested or know someone interested in getting a commission from a crappy and (metaphorically) young furry (would-be)artist here are the details on the prices:

-Sketch: 8 Euros (1 character.+1 Euro for each extra character)
+4 Euros for colour
examples:
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/22690312/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/20738897/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/16633259/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/16201175/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/16127024/

-Drawing (traced lineart) 15 Euros (1 character. +2 Euros for each extra character)
-Drawing (traced and coloured) 20 Euros(1 character.+3 Euros for each extra character)
examples:
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/22725783/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/19822351/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/21913038/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/22571392/
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/22619758/

-Production CD. 45 Euros (expedition taxes not included)
CD including:custom cd cover,blue sketches,sketches,lineart,coloured lineart,OC event file,tiff layered image file.
Bonus content:badge image,website banners (3 sizes). Various odds and ends ;)

I always provide some kind of background to the pictures, but in case of particulairly complex ones i may charge something more (depending on the kind of BG, of course).

Please note:
-I only work in digital at the present time.
-I can draw adult pictures.
-I accept payments through Paypal and personal ceques.
-I am open to discussion suggestions and question, so don't hesitate and contact me (i am a friendly guy and ,generally , don't bite ;))

If you are interested you can contact me in one of the following ways:
messengers:
aim: wolfwerewilder
yahoo: wolfwilder

Email: wolf.wilder@gmail.com

Alternatively, if you are not interested in my crappy stuff but still want to help this poor liger you can use this, to donate money. EVERY single cent will be welcome and will earn this liger's eternal gratitude!
To donate just click on the following button (u need a paypall account, tho):

..is a friend indeed.

Okay, it's like this.  brownkuma  needs some income until he can secure a gig.  Read his LJ to find out what's going on.

  "what can I do to help?  The Bear's in friggin China, right?"

  Yeah, but his art's all over the place.  And he's starting Commissions.  This's where we come in to help...

  Please, anybody reading this!  Post in your LJ, or dA / Y!G Journals about Kuma starting Commissions!  He really needs our help!  And pass it on to your friends to post it, as well!

  I know it's asking a lot, but it's worth it.  Please, guys, help the Bear out, huh?

  His URLs - http://www.liberty2k.com  http://yaoi.y-gallery.net/user/brownkuma  http://brownkuma.deviantart.com

  I really appreciate it.

• Contest: Prospero's books

    • Prospero's books is the adaptation for the big screen by Peter Greenaway , of Shakespeare's "The tempest".Visually striking, charming and mesmerizing.

    An exiled magician finds an opportunity for revenge against his enemies muted when his daughter and the son of his chief enemy fall in love in this uniquely structured retelling of the 'The Tempest".His powers derive from 24 books, each of them delivering deep knowledge in a specific field of the Creation. here is a description of the 24 books: http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm http://petergreenaway.co.uk/prospero.htm

    • The contest:

    Create an image inspired by one of the Books.

    • Rules:

    There are 3 sections:

    • Photography
    • 3d graphics
    • Anthro/manga/cartoon

    You may enter only one image image and pick only one section.So chose what best fits you.

    You must be the owner of the image or have express permission to submit it. I am not responsible for any copyright infringment.

    The image has to be original (not submitted before in any other contest).

    The winners will be decided throug pool, decision being unquestionable.

    • Prizes

    3 places for each section + 1 Special Mention for each section

    1st place: 30 Euros to be spent on www.Amazon.com + a 6 months subscription to DA

    2nd place: a 6 months subscription to DA + full colour commission (example: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/16471601/)

    3rd place: a 3 months subscription to DA + colour sketch (example: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/20738897/)

    Special Mention: full colour commission

    • Submissions and deadline

    If you wanna join, note me so that your name will be added to the list of participants, or email me at wolfwilder@yahoo.com , specyfying which section you wish to participate in.

    the deadline is SEPTEMBER 30th 2005, so lotsa time (unless you are a lazy bum like me ;))

    For further info, questions and doubts email me (do not use my hotmail account) on wolfwilder@yahoo.com or wolf.wilder@gmail.com

    That's all.What are you waiting for? Come on join the contest!

    much luf to everyone!

    WJ - Over and out
